meanings.definition: The quality or state of being monospecific.
meanings.sent1: The monospecificities of the flower make it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the monospecificities of certain antibodies.
meanings.sent3: The monospecificities of the detective's skills led to solving the case quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her monospecificities in choosing the right ingredients for the recipe always amazed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The monospecificities of the rare bird's call made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: The condition of having only one specific characteristic or feature.
meanings.sent1: The monospecificities of the car's engine made it unique.
meanings.sent2: The monospecificities of the plant's leaves helped in its classification.
meanings.sent3: The monospecificities of the superhero's powers made for an interesting comic book.
meanings.sent4: His monospecificities in choosing the perfect gift always impressed his friends.
meanings.sent5: The monospecificities of the gem's color made it highly valuable.
